Title: The World the Girl Saw: The Struggle for Trost, Part 2
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Hiroshi Tsuchida
Plot: Armin tries to cope with the loss of his friends and allies after Titans massacre his squad. Elsewhere in the city, Mikasa manages to take out several of the monsters, which brings back ...
